organic.title: Soldier Recovery Unit - Womack Army Medical Center
organic.snippet: Soldier Recovery Unit provides world class leadership and medical case management to eligible wounded, ill and injured Soldiers.

organic.title: SRU - Evans Army Community Hospital
organic.snippet: The Fort Carson Soldier Recovery Unit (SRU) enhances the readiness of the 4ID/Fort Carson Team by providing mission command, primary care, and case management.
